channel.title: Customers on Welcome To Metricly
channel.description: Recent content in Customers on Welcome To Metricly

item.title: Mixbook
item.description: Back to Stories customer story Mixbook Achieves “High Level of Confidence” in AWS Monitoring Feautured commentator Robert Butler - Senior DevOps Engineer, Uptime Lead and Product Owner About Industry SaaS, Print Company size 51-200 Headquarters Redwood City, CA Objective Automate infrastructure monitoring to meet the demand of a diverse and highly scalable environment. Success Monitoring that automatically learns the behaviour of metrics and newly added resources.

item.title: Oomnitza
item.description: Back to Stories customer story Oomnitza Saves 15% on AWS Costs Using Metricly Feautured commentator Jon Burt - Director of Engineering About Industry SaaS Company size 11-50 Headquarters San Francisco, CA Objective Control rising AWS spending without compromising the overall performance. Success AWS bill reduced by 15% from EC2 sizing reccomendations, while maintaining performance. Product Uses AWS Cost

item.title: Viewpost
item.description: Back to Stories customer story Viewpost Gets Insights To Cut AWS Cost in Half Featured commentators Lawrence “LT” Telfort - Systems Administrator Shawn Strickland - Operations Manager About Industry SaaS, Finance Company size 51-200 Headquarters Maitland, FL Objective To get visibility into gaps of AWS resources cost, and find performance-safe savings. Success Clarity of AWS costs, right-sized EC2 instances, and actionable performance alerting.
